Pre-Game Insights: The San Diego Padres hold a 1-0 series lead heading into Game 2 of the NL Wild Card against the Atlanta Braves.
Joe Musgrove will take the mound for San Diego, while Atlanta will counter with left-hander Max Fried.
The Braves are fighting to extend their season, but the Padres’ home-field advantage will give them a hard battle again.
The Padres are slight favorites at -120, while the Braves are +120 underdogs.
The run total is set at 6.5, indicating that oddsmakers expect a low-scoring game, likely due to the quality of the starting pitchers.
